parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the container cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeGroupedContainerInstances](~~182997~~) operation to query the IDs of container clusters.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace of the Kubernetes cluster.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20.
